posts.title: RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das Hospitalised In Chennai, To Be Discharged Soon
posts.body:
Reserve Bank of India Governor Shaktikanta Das has been admitted to a hospital in Chennai after reportedly experiencing ‘acidity’.

A Reserve Bank of India spokesperson said, “Reserve Bank of India Governor Shri Shaktikanta Das experienced acidity and was admitted to Apollo Hospital, Chennai for observation." “He is now doing fine and will be discharged in the next 2-3 hours. There is no cause for concern", an RBI spokesperson said.

Medical Bulletin on RBI Governor

Apollo Hospital, Chennai issued a medical bulletin providing an update on the health of Shaktikanta Das.

“Reserve Bank of India governor Shri Shaktikanta Das experienced acidity yesterday night and was admitted in Apollo Hospital, Chennai for observations. He is now doing fine and there is no cause of concern," the hospital said in the statement.

posts.title: Ancient Egyptian Mug Contained Psychedelic Cocktail With Blood And Breast Milk: Study
posts.body:
A study on a 2,000-year-old Bes mug has unveiled fascinating ritualistic practices performed by the ancient Egyptians. The mug was found to have a diverse combination of psychedelic chemicals, alcohol and human body fluids. The study is part of the Mediterranean Diet Archeology project and was led by Professor Davide Tanasi from the University of South Florida, with the results published in Scientific Reports.

The use of the Bes mug, specifically designed with the head of Bes — the protection-deity associated with fertility and healing attributes, was previously unknown. Egyptologists were unsure whether the vessel held holy water, milk, wine or beer. However, the recent findings point clearly to its use during rituals, specifically fertility rituals intended to promote safer childbirth and seek divine intervention.

posts.title: Salman’s Comments On Mahesh: Fans in Shock
posts.body:
Salman Khan’s recent comments on Telugu superstar Mahesh Babu have taken the internet by storm. In a recent conversation with Shilpa Shirodkar, Mahesh’s sister-in-law, Salman differentiated between the on-screen persona of Mahesh Babu and the person he is in real life. This conversation took place on the sets of Big Boss 18.

Read more at: https://www.m9.news/bollywood/salman-khans-comments-on-mahesh-babu-fans-in-shock/

posts.title: IPL 2025 Auction: Full Squads Of All 10 Teams, Players' Auction Price
posts.body: The IPL 2025 mega auction saw 182 players sold for a whopping combined fee of Rs 639.15 crore. Rishabh Pant shattered the record of the most expensive purchase, going to Lucknow Super Giants, while Shreyas Iyer was not far behind, moving to Punjab Kings. Indian players were sold at a premium, with Indian fast bowlers doing well on Day 2 of the auction. Here is the team-wise list of the players sold by the end of the second and final day of the Indian Premier League's mega auction here (price in INR):
